channel.title: Banjo-Kazooie on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Banjo-Kazooie on PacoChan's Website

item.title: Finished a Banjo-Kazooie save editor
item.description: As I mentioned when I finished my Super Mario 64 save editor, I was interested in making one for Banjo-Kazooie.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie - Save Editor
item.description: This is a Banjo-Kazooie cross-platform save editor. It is able to edit mostly everything of a save file from the Nintendo 64 version.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie Editor version 1.4
item.description: I’ve made another update to the editor. The main chage is that the program is able to import correctly TGA files with modified resolution.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie Editor version 1.3
item.description: I’ve made another update to the editor. The main chage is that the big font used in some menus of the game is now editable.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie Editor version 1.2
item.description: This time I’ve made a very interesting update to the editor.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie Spanish translation update
item.description: After four years since the release of the first version, here’s an update.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie Editor version 1.1
item.description: I’ve updated this program because one user found a problem while editing the font.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie Editor
item.description: This little program contains some tools to make easier the translation process of Banjo-Kazooie. Note that this is ONLY compatible with the european version of the game.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie (Nintendo 64)
item.description: I started this project in 2009 with the help of Garin as proofreader. Being a big fand of the old Rare, I loved translating this game.
